# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```
julia> function wrap_string(words::String, text_width::Int=10)
        lines = []
        current_line = ""
        words = split(words)
        for word in words
            if length(current_line) + length(word) + 1 â‰¤ text_width
                current_line *= word * " "
            else
                push!(lines, current_line)
                current_line = word * " "
            end
        end
        push!(lines, current_line)
        join(lines, "\n")
    end
wrap_string (generic function with 2 methods)

julia> wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")
"This function will
 wrap words into lines
"
